alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Logan and Simpson Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Guthrie to 12 miles northwest of Springfield to near White House. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Russellville around 530 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville.
